long_description: This solid multi-bike storage system can also serve as a light-duty portable work stand. Store two bikes with easily adjustable hanger mounts. Constructed of aluminum tubing, the center pillar extends to almost seven feet and the tripod base holds the stand stable and steady. Quick-release lever adjusts the pillar height. Hangers are easy to move and tighten; they adjust 30 degrees from horizontal. Includes one handlebar stabilizer for steadying your bike during maintenance.
short_description: This solid multi-bike storage system can also serve as a light-duty portable work stand.
